Class ErrorFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.logging.ErrorFormatter

  • public class ErrorFormatter
extends Formatter
    Format a log record for error output, including a stack trace if available.
